description: Manage and access your static proxy IPs from NinjaProxy. Retrieve your proxy IPs, get specific proxies by index, and obtain ready-to-use proxy configurations for HTTP requests. Simplify proxy management and integration for your applications.

NINJAPROXY_API_KEY.description: Your NinjaProxy API key from ninjaproxy.com

tools.name: set_api_key
tools.description: Set the API key for accessing the NinjaProxy service

tools.name: get_my_proxies
tools.description: Get your assigned static proxy IPs

format.description: Return format - simple (just addresses) or detailed (with credentials)

tools.name: get_proxy_by_index
tools.description: Get a specific proxy from your list by index (0-based)

index.description: Index of the proxy to retrieve (0-based)

tools.name: get_proxy_config
tools.description: Get proxy configuration for making HTTP requests

url.description: Target URL for the request (for examples)

index.description: Index of proxy to configure (alternative to proxy_address)

proxy_address.description: Specific proxy address to configure (format: ip:port)
